segments.text: Hi , my name ’ s Karl . My wife and I are moving in next door .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Karl . I ’ m Chuck Jones . We ’ re going to be neighbors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m happy to meet you . It seems everyone in town is so friendly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is a small town , and we like to be neighborly . We know everyone who lives around here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ m from Chicago . There few people take the time to get to know their neighbors .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , tell me , Karl , hyoid you come all the way to Minnesota to live ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We wanted to live in a more peaceful community and have more space . Another reason is , we can afford to buy a home here , but we can ’ t in Chicago !
segments.speaker: S1
